Package no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.Game
@Entity public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a game. It contains a player, a story, and a list of goals. It also contains the current passage of the game.
Author:
Erik Bjørnsen and Emil Klevgård-Slåttsveen
See Also:

    • getGoals

      public List<Goal> getGoals()
      Gets the goals of the game.
      Returns:
      the goals

    • setGoals

      public void setGoals(List<Goal> goals)
      Sets the goals of the game. Removes all goals from the game and adds the goals in the list. Empty lists are allowed.
      Parameters:
      goals - the goals to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of goals contains a null goal

    • addGoals

      public void addGoals(List<Goal> goals)
      Adds a list of goals to the game. Empty lists are allowed.
      Parameters:
      goals - the goals to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of goals contains a null goal

    • addGoal

      public void addGoal(Goal goal)
      Adds a goal to the game.
      Parameters:
      goal - the goal to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the goal is null

    • removeGoal

      public void removeGoal(Goal goal)
      Removes a goal from the game.
      Parameters:
      goal - the goal to remove
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the goal is not in the game
      IllegalArgumentException - if the goal is null

    • removeAllGoals

      public void removeAllGoals()
      Removes all goals from the game.

      Method to get the opening passage of the story.
      Returns:
      the opening passage of the story

    • go

      public Passage go(Link link)
      Method to go to a passage. If the link is not available, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      link - the link to go to
      Returns:
      the next passage from the link
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the link is not available

    • restart

      public void restart()
      Method to restart the game. Sets the current passage to the opening passage of the story.
